title: Would anyone be interested in a matchmade mode that had bots and players on both teams?
body: The key thing that comes to mind here is that each team would have some number of bots in it, and if a player wanted to leave a bot would just take over (even if it has to be a bot of a different champion). This way people would have a stress free environment to practice against real people and dummies and could always leave without harming anyone if they got frustrated or interrupted.
